steps.step: Set the Instant Pot to Saut√© and add all of the ground beef
Add seasoning (Black Pepper, onion powder) and mix the meat until it appears to be golden brown
Add all of the Pasta to the pot
Add all of the Diced Tomatoes to the pot
Add all of the Scallions to the pot
Add all of the Tomato Sauce to the pot
Stir to mix all of the contents together
Set the Instant Pot to Manual and cook for 10 minutes
